1.content:
Choose a character you'd like to see fattened.

Girls only!
1.title: You're a kid now, you're obese now!

11.content: Now go nuts! Write any story you want :)
11.title: Inkling Girl

111.content:
Haley just got done with another Turf War, this time her side won majority in a landslide. They inked nearly 95% of the entire map, covering everything in a nice shade of orange.
Haley was an average sized Inklin with orange 'hair', two tentacles swept backwards that reached down to the back of her knees. She wore a white tank-top that cut off at her midriff, and tight, black shorts. She was in the locker room, calming down after the match when she was suddenly shot at by one of her teammates.
"Hah! Good job out there, Haley!" Travis, a male inkling, stated.
Haley giggled, shooting Travis back. "You, too, Trav!"
Travis spat out the orange ink. "Well, you know me, I'm always Tenta-cool under pressure, hehe!" He responded with a smirk, shooting another glob of ink at Haley.
"Hahah-- Oolp!" Haley was laughing so hard she accidentally got the ink Travis shot at her into her mouth. She instinctivly swallowed, sticking her tongue out. "Ulf..."
"Oh, I'm sorry! I didn't mean to--"
"...Mmm! That was actually pretty good... I wonder if...?" Haley licked her lips, slurping that down as well. She then unhooked the tube that connected to her tank from her gun, and placed it in her mouth. She inhaled deeply, swallowing all of her ink. "Ooh, this is so good...!"

Travis was confused. He'd never tried his own ink, and never thought anyone else would either. He did notice, however, one thing about it that was making Haley different...
111.title: Delicious Ink

1111.content: As Haley’s Ink entered her mouth, her body began to... expand, her stomach becoming thicker and thicker, a layer of flab forming from the ink, as her tank-top slowly rode up on her, while her bust was rising in size, as she finally pulled it out with her now pretty flabby arms and took a step forward, her thighs jiggled with fat and Joy, double the size and she...
1111.title: It was making her fatter

choices: “Maybe we should leave the locker room before you grow.”
11111.content:
Haley stared as her whole body jiggled around rapidly, it gurgling and sloshing with ink. She pushed her hand on her huge thigh which felt like an incredibly soft pillow. A big smile went on her face as she squeezed her massive belly, “I’m huge!” she said, “Wow, this feels amazing!” she continued to squeeze her super soft stomach. “This is more satisfying then any turf war win could ever make me!” she said as she bounced her gigantic bust.
Travis stared at the humongous squid, his cheeks red hot. “Haley, y-your ginormous!” he said with a stutter. She looked over at him with a grin “How do I look now Travis?” “Think all this flab is cute?” She asked as she towered over him with her big belly. “.... yeah” Travis said nervously as her big body intimidated him. “Do you want me to get bigger?” Travis answered honestly “Yes I do... I love your huge body and want it to get bigger!” He blurred out to express his true feelings to her. Haley’s stern attitude went away as she cheerfully scooped Travis up and bear hugged him. “Oh thank you Travis, your such a great friend!” She said to him as she squeezed him tighter to her stomach. What normally would have been painful for Travis was cushioned by her big soft belly, Travis loved how soft her stomach was. “I would of expected you to be weirded out by my body.” she said to Travis. Travis said “I guess I just like big inklings, to be honest, I like you better this way.” he said to her. Haley squeezed tighter “Thank you Travis, I’ll get bigger just for you!”. She put Travis down and quickly grabbed the tube to the ink tank and was about to put it in her mouth again, until Travis said...
11111.title: Noticed Her Sudden Gain 1

choices: Put her ink gun in her mouth and began to drink up from her ink gun
Put an ink hose up her butt and let it fill her up
Put on something a bit more stretchy and fitting for when she grows
112.content:
A little Inkling named Mona who had a normal white shirt tight black spats and speakers was wondering how she could become a better player in her team.

She was never very good at being a gunner sniper or roller and she felt like a bit of a burden on the team always getting inked by the other team.
But one day Mona got a genius idea when she looked at a game and saw someone throwing an ink bomb.
"What if I became a bomb? she said as a light turned on in her head.

It was so simple fill herself with ink and then when she reaches critical mass she'll explode into a massive wave of ink and wipe out the other team in an instant and cover the whole map in seconds flat.
It was genius why had no one thought it of before she thought?

Of course this would mean she would have to grow big and round and drink tons of ink for this to work and even then blowing up might suck a bit.
But she was willing to try. besides what was the worse that could happen?

On the start of a new match Mona got ready feeling confident as she.....
112.title: Ink bomb!

choices: Mona ended up spending the entire match growing.
Mona's team realize they're not getting any ink, and get suspicious.
Mona adds a second tube to her mouth, hoping that will be enough.
1122.content:
Mona found a nearby hose that was connected directly to the main source of ink. This would be perfect, she thought to herself. After ensuring nobody was around to see her, she unhooked the tube from the wall and quickly slid it down her pants. She could feel it snaking it's way through her butt, pumping her with thick, liquidy ink.
A smile grew across her face as she felt her body expand, filling with the ink and causing her to bulge and jiggle. Her clothes tightened, fat folds forcing them up and down her body, revealing more skin as time went on. She was loving her growth so far, and she knew she would need to get much bigger if she wanted to be an ink bomb. She would need to reach a point large enough to just barely burst, without bursting.

As time went on, the ink continued to pump inside her, and she felt no more full than she did a while back. She had done her best to increase the flow, hoping that would speed things up, yet she still did not feel any closer to bursting. She let out a sigh, checking the clock and noticing that the game was already halfway done!
"Come on," Mona complained, patting her own hips. "Hurry! My team needs me!"
1122.title: Put an ink hose up her butt and let it fill her up

12.title: Octoling Girl

info.brief_description: Characters from Splatoon are getting bigger!
info.description: Rules are no scat, no gore and no transfomaton. Age Regression is fine ;) Also stick with main gainer in their respective paths, other than that, enjoy some fat woomies!
